name: CHRONODOME
description:
The year is 1998, and you must enter

THE CHRONODOME

1998's most popular sport, where contestants must fight not only legions of powerful drones, but themselves. 

each wave, an echo of yourself from the previous wave joins the fight, giving you even more to dodge! Your weapons change every wave, so think on your feet to destroy the legions of drones.

How far can you get in this endless wave shooter?

Controls

Left Click: Shoot

Shift: Sprint

Escape: Pause

Made for the Jam About Time 2021
